metadata.name: HoDA [house of digital art] #1
metadata.description:
architects: asya gulak & panova zoia
ukrainian bureau: LLC'ACC'PORTAL-21'
year: 2022

Token is an experimental architectural project of a modern  art gallery, the function of which is to present contemporary digital art in a new format. The possibility of integrating the object into the Metaverse, as well as its further development IRLife. Rethinking approaches to the connections between technologies and Art.
Token is divided into 4  NFTs on FND & 4 NFTs  on Opensea market. All tokens on FND are keys to tickets- utilities on Opensea market -https://opensea.io/collection/hodatickets
tickets -utilities contain  different info with:  plans, architectural sections, facades, visualizations of token, 3D model, as well as a detailed description of the concept from architects, logotype, art gifs & specific datas. As soon as the token-key is sold one of the ticket-utilities  will be transferred to the owner's wallet. 

 /HoDA as a new way to communication/
